hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(printf '%s' "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')
if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(md|txt)$ ]] && [[ ! "$file_path" =~ (README|CLAUDE|AGENTS|CONTRIBUTING)\.md$ ]]; then
  echo "[Hook] BLOCKED: Use README.md for documentation" >&2
  exit 1
fi
printf '%s\n' "$input"
